message.content:
We need to determine the value of accumulated depreciation as of the beginning and end of the period. In our case no depreciation had been recorded at the very start (when setting up the books, the Fixed Assets entry is recorded at its gross cost, not net of any depreciation) so the accumulated depreciation “initial value” is zero. Then, look for the depreciation transactions within the period:

• On 2024‑01‑01 there is a Depreciation entry for 45,754.08.
• On 2024‑02‑01 there is a Depreciation entry for 45,755.86.

The accumulated depreciation “end value” equals the sum of these depreciation amounts:
  45,754.08 + 45,755.86 = 91,509.94

Thus, the accumulated depreciation at the period’s start is 0.00 and at period‐end is 91,509.94.

Below is the answer in the required JSON format:

{"solution": {'Accumulated Depreciation Initial Value': '0.00', 'Accumulated Depreciation End Value': '91509.94'}}
